fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document) and Vanhanen(2003).
fxInfo_clarification: Missing data within a time-series is interpolated using a linear model, increasing the number of observations from 930 to 7774.
fxInfo_question: What percentage of (cultivated) land area is comprised of family farms?
